sections.heading: sessions of city councils; authorized
sections.text: The city councils of two or more cities of the first class may meet and hold joint sessions for purposes of the First-Class City Merger Act.SourceLaws 2008, LB1056, ยง 15.

16-1115.Joint sessions of city councils; authorized.

The city councils of two or more cities of the first class may meet and hold joint sessions for purposes of the First-Class City Merger Act.

SourceLaws 2008, LB1056, ยง 15.
